## Overview

<p>Utilities for working with the
<a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Streams_API" rel="nofollow">Streams API</a>.</p>
<p>Includes buffering and conversion.</p>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { toText } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/streams"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-k">const</span> stream <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-smi">ReadableStream</span>.<span class="pl-en">from</span>([<span class="pl-s">"Hello, world!"</span>]);
<span class="pl-k">const</span> text <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">await</span> <span class="pl-en">toText</span>(stream);

<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(text, <span class="pl-s">"Hello, world!"</span>);
</code></pre>
